mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SLE (SEQ_SLE, SLE_NM, IMG, PRICE_SALE, DESCES, CD_CTG_B, CD_CTG_M, CD_STATE_SALE, PRD_TYPE, COUNT_STOCK, CORP_NM, FLG_DELETE, DT_SALE_START, DT_SALE_END, DISCOUNT, DT_REG, REGISTER, POINT_STACK) VALUES (SQ_SEQ_SLE.NEXTVAL, #{sle_nm}, #{img}, #{price_sale}, #{desces}, #{cd_ctg_b}, #{cd_ctg_m}, #{cd_state_sale}, #{prd_type}, #{count_stock}, #{corp_nm}, #{flg_delete}, TO_DATE(#{dt_sale_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{dt_sale_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{discount}, SYSDATE, #{register}, #{point_stack})
